comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: This is the Umpqua River Bridge, a swing bridge built in 1914 by the Southern Pacific and currently the Coos Bay Line of the Central Oregon & Pacific Railroad. Here's an aerial map. According to Wikipedia, this section of track has been out of use for a couple of years because of necessary tunnel repairs. Today: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/77136894@N00/2217706784/]
